mapper.insert: insert into cy_kinquiry (fd_id, fd_creat_person, fd_creat_time, fd_filename, fd_url) values (#{fd_id}, #{fd_creat_person}, #{fd_creat_time}, #{fd_filename}, #{fd_url})
mapper.update: update cy_kinquiry_details set fd_bid_opentime=#{fd_bid_opentime}, fd_bid_closetime = #{fd_bid_closetime}, fd_supplier_name =#{fd_supplier_name}, fd_supplier_code =#{fd_supplier_code}, fd_status = #{fd_status} where fd_id = #{fd_id}
mapper.select: select * from cy_kinquiry_details where 1=1 and fd_parent_id = #{fd_parent_id}
